name: hustle
caption: Hustle

effect.short: Strengthens physical moves to inflict 1.5× damage, but decreases their [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy} to 0.8×.
effect.full:
This Pokémon's physical moves do 1.5× as much [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}, but have 0.8× their usual [accuracy]{mechanic:accuracy}.

Special moves are unaffected.  Moves that do set damage, such as []{move:seismic-toss}, have their accuracy affected, but not their damage.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.

flavorText: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
